hero.subtitle: Where the light of ideas meets the spirit of Madinah

about_tedx.title: What is TEDx?
about_tedx.content_p1: TEDx is a program of local, self-organized events that bring people together to share a TED-like experience. At a TEDx event, TED Talks video and live speakers combine to spark deep discussion and connection in a small group.
about_tedx.content_p2: The x in TEDx stands for independently organized TED event. TEDx events are planned and coordinated independently, on a community-by-community basis, under a free license from TED.
about_tedx.content_p3: TEDx events follow the TED format and are organized independently with the TED spirit: ideas worth spreading.

about_upm.title: About TEDxUPM
about_upm.intro_subtitle: The Light of Ideas with the Light of Place
about_upm.content_p1: In a city where the light of ideas meets the light of place, where the radiance of inspiration intertwines with the luminance of Madinah, stories pulse with a unique glow unlike any other city.
about_upm.content_p2: Here... where the brilliance of history meets the radiance of the soul, where hospitality transcends service to become a feeling that illuminates the heart before the place.
about_upm.content_p3: This year's TEDxUPM edition presents an event not just to be watched... but felt and lived. An event bringing together the light of ideas worth spreading, the light of a city that has inspired the world for centuries, and the light of inspiration born when human experience intertwines with the deep values of this blessed land.
about_upm.tourism_content_p1: In alignment with Saudi Vision 2030's objectives to make Madinah a leading global destination for historical and cultural tourism, Prince Muqrin University has adopted this year's TEDxUPM event targeting the "tourism" sector to raise awareness of future opportunities in tourism and connect students with their role in developing this promising field.
about_upm.tourism_content_p2: As one of the first universities offering academic programs in international tourism and hospitality, this is an ideal opportunity to lead this qualitative dialogue about tourism transformation and the role of youth in enriching the visitor experience and developing destinations in Madinah through strategic partnerships with relevant entities.
about_upm.quote: Madinah is not a place to visit... but an identity to live
